Roll Wraps 1 dozen 

Chicken Fillet 2 

Cabbage (chopped) 1 small flower 

Carrots (grated) 2 

Soya Sauce 1 tbsp 

White Vinegar 1 tbsp 

Capsicum (chopped) 1 

Sugar 1 tap 

Salt to taste 

Chicken Cube Flour 1 tsp 

Egg Whites 2 

Sesame Seed Oil 1 tsp 

Ginger Garlic 1 tsp 

Black Pepper (crushed) 1 tsp 

Oil to fry 

Red Chili Flakes 1 tbsp

1. Cook Chicken fillet with 1tsp Ginger Garlic Paste, salt and dry them in its own water. 

2. In a karahi, take 2 tbsp oil, chicken boti, chopped cabbage, grated carrot and chopped Capsicum. Stir Fry it. 

3. Add in 1 tbsp soya sauce, 1 tbsp white vinegar, sugar, crushed black pepper, 1 tbsp Crushed red Chili and 1 tsp Chicken cube flour. Mix it and cool it. 

4. Fill in the mixture in the roll wrap and wrap it with egg white. 

5. Deep fry them till golden brown. 

6. Serve with tomato ketchup.
